body:
@pawzuri Gotou-kun (mc) and Agawa (the gyaru) got caught on cam fucking, and while their faces werent shown, students and teachers figured it out. The bf type dude Yuuki beats the shit out of MC and threatens to kill him if he ever gets close to her again. Ultimately staff and students assume that it was Agawa and Yuuki on the video, and not MC, so they most likely got expelled. Gotous friend confronts him and asks him why he hasnt gone to see her, since he knows where she lives. Gotou answers that they werent even dating, she just let him have sex with her. The friend comments that he thought that even so, Gotou would chase after her til the end of the world.

Of course, Gotou chases after her, Yuuki threatening to kill him, she begs him to stop but at the very end he yells that he wants to fuck with her. Regarding Yuuki/the bf, its unclear if hes actually her bf, Agawa just likes to have sex, which is why she slept even with a teacher. But Yuuki may not know, and thinks hes her bf.
Who is more simp here? She cheated on you (the boyfriend?) and he still is with her? WTF
Oi oi can someone briefly summarize the story?
bruh this dude got balls of steel screaming that
